none: Bryan Lothian - パンク / ПАНК cassette EP
Bryan Lothian - パンク / ПАНК cassette EP

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 04, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
What is PARLAMENTARISK SODOMI was obsessed with Japanese hardcore? It's the same relentless vibe, but where our Norwegian friends would start to blast, BRYAN LOTHIAN instead drops in the wildest fukkn hooks and I kinda can't stand it. They both project an astral psychedelia (PINS OF LIGHT playing HC rippers?) and I can't help but think they are split from the same cloth and/or perhaps separated at birth. Nine killer cuts spread out over two digital releases later combined onto one cassette EP, a non-stop hardcore bedroom party filled with more than enough riffs to take you through the isolation. This project is the brainchild of a dude from A GLOBAL THREAT, and is responsible for almost seventy (mostly digital) releases over the last five years. It's a staggering output, and it doesn't take much digging to understand how outmatched you are. Check "Cold Shoulders" and "War Porn," then start from the beginning.  パンク / ПАНК
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZjNwnV6jElE/XoiqgNX3RwI/AAAAAAAAW6o/q4Jrr0MItfgpqh_hn8JGOF4FaeLddX2rwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Bryan%2B-%2B%25D0%259B%25D0%2590%25D0%259D%25D0%259A%2Bcopy.jpg https://bryanlothian.bandcamp.com/ https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jbGI1KUpFaw/XoiqgG5vAtI/AAAAAAAAW6s/lkxuVe824OYd89Ip5QGgPuqGBP4LenHDwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/Bryan%2B-%2B%25E3%2583%258F%25E3%2582%259A%25E3%2583%25B3%25E3%2582%25AF%2Bcopy.jpg
